title: 'Life Itself': An Unflinching Documentary Of Roger Ebert's Life And Death
teaser: In late 2012, filmmaker Steve James and Roger Ebert began talking about filming a documentary based on Ebert's memoir. Ebert's wife, Chaz, agreed. They didn't know that he would die within months.
contentencoded:
